entry.title: Fattest Bullhead Ever! Huge Multi-Species Day on the Kayak! | Lake Holcomb Crappie, Bass and Catfish
entry.summary: I take the kayak out to Lake Holcomb and catch a TON of fish! Literally the fattest bullhead catfish I have EVER seen! It is a great trip with a great outcome. I get a bit rained on....ok it pours on me, but that's…
entry.content:
I take the kayak out to Lake Holcomb and catch a TON of fish! Literally the fattest bullhead catfish I have EVER seen! It is a great trip with a great outcome. I get a bit rained on....ok it pours on me, but that's fishing. Come along and see all of the action and the catches! This is what kayak fishing is all about!

entry.title: Winter Fishing with my Son
entry.summary: I take my youngest son for some rainy weather fishing at March's Pond. We try a bunch of different things, but it's really about the good time we had, even with the crummy weather. Fishing didn't turn out too well, but it was a…
entry.content:
I take my youngest son for some rainy weather fishing at March's Pond. We try a bunch of different things, but it's really about the good time we had, even with the crummy weather. Fishing didn't turn out too well, but it was a fun and hilarious time!

entry.title: Kayak Catfish on Lake Woodlands
entry.summary: I take the Lifetime Tamarak Angler 100 out to Lake Woodlands. I get to the lake to see a grand sunrise. I spend several hours on the lake, same spot as last time, then I get up through some canals and it's a rough…
entry.content:
I take the Lifetime Tamarak Angler 100 out to Lake Woodlands. I get to the lake to see a grand sunrise. I spend several hours on the lake, same spot as last time, then I get up through some canals and it's a rough day on the water, but don't get skunked. I get a nice channel catfish and a snapping turtle. Talked to some other anglers and they ended up having the same slow day, as I did.

#catfish #kayakfishing #lakewoodlands

entry.title: Multi-Species Bank Fishing | White Crappie, Channel Catfish and Largemouth Bass
entry.summary: I go out to Lake Holcomb on a balmy Saturday morning and catch several different fish - white crappie, channel catfish and largemouth bass. I also show some tactics on setting up my crawfish Texas rig and my catfish rig which is a slightly…
entry.content:
I go out to Lake Holcomb on a balmy Saturday morning and catch several different fish - white crappie, channel catfish and largemouth bass. I also show some tactics on setting up my crawfish Texas rig and my catfish rig which is a slightly modified Carolina rig. Watch the action unfold!

#crappie #bass #catfish

SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week - http://bit.ly/2LVRobp

entry.title: Catching Big Bass From The Bank with My Daughters
entry.summary: The girls and I go back out to March's Pond to try for some trout. We didn't seem to get any bites for trout, but we all landed tournament worthy bass. Bobbers with nightcrawlers, lipless crankbait and a Texas-rigged Strike King worm seemed to…
entry.content:
The girls and I go back out to March's Pond to try for some trout. We didn't seem to get any bites for trout, but we all landed tournament worthy bass. Bobbers with nightcrawlers, lipless crankbait and a Texas-rigged Strike King worm seemed to be the baits the fish wanted today.

SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week - http://bit.ly/2LVRobp

entry.title: Kayak Fishing Lake Woodlands | Largemouth Bass & Channel Catfish
entry.summary: We are going to Lake Woodlands on the second voyage in my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 kayak. It's quite an eventful day catching a nice largemouth on a drop shot, then bringing in some nice channel catfish using nightcrawlers and chicken liver. Not…
entry.content:
We are going to Lake Woodlands on the second voyage in my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 kayak. It's quite an eventful day catching a nice largemouth on a drop shot, then bringing in some nice channel catfish using nightcrawlers and chicken liver. Not to forget, I rip off my DBPower N5 Pro camera right off the bow, dumping it into the lake..... All in all, it was a great trip on the kayak.

First catch - 9:14
Hilarity - Camera ripped off of the bow - 13:06
Hilarity - Camera ripped off of the bow (slow-mo) - 13:12
Camera retrieved in net - 16:28
Second catch - 17:40
Third catch - 22:22
Fourth catch - 26:29

entry.title: Lifetime Tamarack Angler Kayak Fishing for Bass and Crappie
entry.summary: Join me on my maiden voyage with my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 Kayak. I go out to a nice, calm place just off of Spring Creek. I'm a novice and you can tell. But, I don't get skunked! Pull in my personal best…
entry.content:
Join me on my maiden voyage with my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 Kayak. I go out to a nice, calm place just off of Spring Creek. I'm a novice and you can tell. But, I don't get skunked! Pull in my personal best white crappie and a largemouth. There will be many more adventures on the kayak.

entry.title: Bottom Fishing for ... Bass! We go to March's Pond.
entry.summary: My daughters and I go out to March's Pond, a new spot for us. We are fishing with night crawlers, chicken and an assortment of lures. But you'll be surprised at the catch.
